column4: can any1 help me, im having issues trying to install ubuntu 12.04

ok, im trying to install ubuntu 12.04 from a usb but when the screen with the options to install it its supposed to appear instead a bunch of lines and dots appears, as if the screen was broken. I tried ubuntu 10,10 and the same happens
i have a laptop, lenovo ideapad
sometimes you have to install plugging a monitor to the laptop, but when ubuntu boots normally after instlled it will work with your laptop lcd
